SEARCH
Package Cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
Cards.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Card_Minion, Card_Spell, Card_Weapon
public abstract class Card extends Object
Represents a card in a game, encompassing all properties and behaviors including attack mechanics, health points, mana cost, and interactions with weapons.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String name, int manaCost, int power, int whose)
      Constructs a card with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the card.
      manaCost - The mana cost required to play the card.
      power - The attack power of the card.
      whose - The player identifier this card belongs to.

    • attackCard

      public void attackCard(Card opponents_card, Board yourBoard, Board opponents_Board)
      Handles the logic for this card attacking another card.
      Parameters:
      opponents_card - The card being attacked.
      yourBoard - The board of the attacking card.
      opponents_Board - The board of the defending card.

    • attackInResponse

      public void attackInResponse(Card opponents_card)
      Handles the card's response to being attacked.
      Parameters:
      opponents_card - The attacking card.

    • restoringValues

      public void restoringValues()
      Resets the card's health to its initial state.

    • death

      public void death(Board board)
      Handles the card's death, removing it from the board and sending it to the graveyard.
      Parameters:
      board - The board from which the card will be removed.

      public void getInfo()
      Outputs the card's details to the system output.
